title: Expression of Ret/PTC1, -2, -3, -delta3 and -4 in German papillary thyroid carcinoma.
abstract_text: Ret/PTC oncogene has been described with a frequency of 2.5-30% in papillary thyroid carcinomas. We examined the expression of ret/PTC in 99 German papillary thyroid carcinomas, including two recently described new variants of ret/PTC3 and identified eight ret/PTC-positive tumours (8%) but none with the new variants.
